discourse_list.title: Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions ||| Session #14: Dai Foundation Core Unit DAIF-001

content.content: Session #14: Dai Foundation Core Unit1279×720 109 KB    Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions ||| Session #14: Dai Foundation Core Unit DAIF-001 For this episode we’ll be joined by Søren Peter Nielsen (@sorenpeter), who’s proposing the creation of the Dai Foundation Core Unit with the mission of safeguarding Maker’s intangible assets following the principles defined in its Trust Deed. You can find the Core Unit proposal set here. As usual, anyone can join and ask to their heart’s content. @juan will be doing the hosting   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-08-04T16:00:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where When the time is ripe, follow this Zoom link  Or use this information:  Meeting ID: 829 4277 3725 Passcode: COREUNIT Find your local number: Zoom International Dial-in Numbers - Zoom  attn: @SES-Core-Unit, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit, @Growth-Core-Unit, @Content-Production, @MakerMikeP, @Coulter, @twblack88, @flipflopflapdelegate, @g_dip, @planet_x, @iammeeoh, @ultraschuppi, @ejbarraza
This call is now available for review on the MakerDAO Youtube Channel:
